name: Rocket Rampage (From Scratch Games)
description:
THIS IS A DIRECT COPY OF MOBILE VERSION - PLEASE SEE FURTHER DOWN FOR PC CONTROLS. THANKS!

In this faced paced game you will pilot a rocket ship around a tight and dangerous course as fast as you can, dodge the various obstacles and find all the collectables to earn all 3 medals in each level. Use the rockets thrust and gravity to your advantage to master each course in this simple but fun and addictive game.

PC CONTROLS
Space - Thrust
A or Left Arrow - Rotate Left
S or Right Arrow - Rotate Right
W - Restart Level (if Game Over)

All buttons still work, the above just makes it playable on PC.
